mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_nick, ref_group, cmt_group, deleted, ebd_file_cmt.regdate FROM ebd_file_cmt INNER JOIN users ON ebd_file_cmt.writer=users.nick WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY cmt_group DESC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_file_cmt (num, writer, content, target_nick, ref_group, cmt_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_nick}, #{ref_group}, #{cmt_group}, SYSDATE )
